description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 23/01314/FUL (Demolition of existing temporary classrooms, erection of two storey 7nos classroom block and storage unit with an increase to pupil roll.). Amendment to front and side fenestrations.

decision_conditions: The approved development 23/01314/FUL shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:120 Rev P1 Floor Plans and Elevations-Storage Unit 100 Rev P4 Proposed Block Plan 01 Rev P3 Location and Block Plans 10 Rev P2 Ground Floor Plan 101 Rev P3 Fire Access Plan 105 Rev P2 Proposed Landscape Plan 110 Rev P4 Proposed  Floor Plans 300 Rev P5 Proposed Roof Plan and Elevations Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning
The proposed amendments to planning permission 23/01314/FUL are considered to be non-material.
